entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rock Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Osoyoos 1:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 29 %
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
